WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
Before, I used Local Update Publisher on Windows 2008 R2 WSUS.
I migrated my WSUS server on 2012 R2, and I changed for WSUS Package Publisher.

I'm trying to do the same think like in LUP : modify XML code (at the end of update creating) to publish a MSP update that have a bad development.
In LUP, I have just to modify XML language tag from 1031,1033,1036 to 1033 only

Is it possible to do it with WPP ?

Thanks in advance

Gregory
WorkItem.Summary: Modify XML coda before plublishing an update

Comments.Message:
* Add a feature to allows XML Metadata edition before publishing/revising an update (For MSI/MSP Metadata)
 * Add a 'Search And Replace' function when editing XML Metadata.
 * Add a function to validate the XML Metadata against the official XSD used by Wsus to validate these Metadata.
